中文品名: 歐克健康血糖監測系統
英文品名: OKmeter Lumina Blood Glucose Monitoring System
效能: The system is intended for use outside the body (in vitro diagnostic use only). It should be used only for testing blood glucose (blood sugar) and only with fresh capillary whole blood samples. The system is intended for use in the home and in clinical settings. It should not be used for the diagnosis of diabetes or for the testing of newborns.
醫器規格: OKmeter Lumina Blood Glucose Monitoring System: Blood glucose meter, blood glucose test strips, lancing device, lancets.OKmeter Lumina Blood Glucose Test Strips: Blood glucose test strips.以下空白
醫器主類別一: A臨床化學及臨床毒理學
